title: Ethereal Ruby & Polki Diamond Haaram
features: A unique blend of traditional and modern design. The necklace features geometric frames encasing exquisite Polki diamonds. Dangling Ruby clusters accent each section, adding a touch of color and dynamism. The setting enhances the brilliance of both the Polkis and Rubies. Light and comfortable to wear.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for modern cocktail parties or galas.
description: This haaram perfectly marries tradition with a modern aesthetic, making it a truly unique piece. The exceptional craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. The vibrant rubies provide a stunning contrast to the brilliance of the Polki diamonds, making this a statement piece that will be treasured for generations. Crafted with the finest Hyderabadi artistry.
